00021 #include "CreateStep.h"

00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00024 
00026 #define CREATED_STEP_NONE std::wstring(L"None")
00027 
00029 #define CREATED_STEP_ARRAY_REG std::wstring(L"ArrayRegistration")
00030 
00032 #define CREATED_STEP_SCAN std::wstring(L"Scanning")
00033 
00035 #define CREATED_STEP_GRID std::wstring(L"Gridding")
00036 
00038 #define CREATED_STEP_CEL std::wstring(L"CELAnalysis")
00039 
00041 #define CREATED_STEP_OTHER std::wstring(L"Other")
00042 
00044 #define CREATED_STEP_FROM std::wstring(L"From")
00045 
00047 #define CREATED_STEP_JOB_ORDER std::wstring(L"JobOrderServer")
00048 
00050 #define CREATED_STEP_FILE_INDEXER std::wstring(L"FileIndexer")
00051 
00052 /*
00053  * Convert the step type to a string.
00054  */
00055 std::wstring affymetrix_calvin_array::CreateStepToString(CreateStep step)
00056 {
00057         switch (step)
00058         {
00059         case NoStep:
00060                 return CREATED_STEP_NONE;
00061                 break;
00062 
00063         case ArrayRegistrationStep:
00064                 return CREATED_STEP_ARRAY_REG;
00065                 break;
00066 
00067         case ScanningStep:
00068                 return CREATED_STEP_SCAN;
00069                 break;
00070 
00071         case GriddingStep:
00072                 return CREATED_STEP_GRID;
00073                 break;
00074 
00075         case CELAnalysisStep:
00076                 return CREATED_STEP_CEL;
00077                 break;
00078 
00079         case OtherStep:
00080                 return CREATED_STEP_OTHER;
00081                 break;
00082 
00083         case FromStep:
00084                 return CREATED_STEP_FROM;
00085                 break;
00086                 
00087         case JobOrderServerStep:
00088                 return CREATED_STEP_JOB_ORDER;
00089                 break;
00090                 
00091         case FileIndexerStep:
00092                 return CREATED_STEP_FILE_INDEXER;
00093                 break;
00094 
00095         default:
00096                 return L"";
00097                 break;
00098         }
00099 }
00100 
00101 /*
00102  * Convert a string to step type.
00103  */
00104 CreateStep affymetrix_calvin_array::CreateStepFromString(const std::wstring &step)
00105 {
00106         if (step == CREATED_STEP_NONE)
00107                 return NoStep;
00108 
00109         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_ARRAY_REG)
00110                 return ArrayRegistrationStep;
00111 
00112         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_SCAN)
00113                 return ScanningStep;
00114 
00115         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_GRID)
00116                 return GriddingStep;
00117 
00118         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_CEL)
00119                 return CELAnalysisStep;
00120 
00121         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_OTHER)
00122                 return OtherStep;
00123 
00124         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_FROM)
00125                 return FromStep;
00126                 
00127         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_JOB_ORDER)
00128                 return JobOrderServerStep;
00129 
00130         else if (step == CREATED_STEP_FILE_INDEXER)
00131                 return FileIndexerStep;
00132 
00133         else
00134                 return OtherStep;
00135 }
